PHOTO_TITLE: Please, send a photo of the found garbage

WASTE_TITLE: We will guide you to the nearest recycling collection point or to the pickup service.
REWARD_TITLE:
Follow the steps below to get your NFT!

1) Give access to your geopositions
2) Take a photo of recyclable materials (background - the recycling collection point)
3) Get NFT to your wallet or to charity (your choice)

ENTER_PHOTOS: Please, send a photo of the trash you brought to the recycling center
